entities.description: A state within the United States where the survey data was collected.
The number of responses from the state, not adjusted for weighting.
The percentage of the total responses that come from the state.
The total number of valid responses recorded in the survey.
The minimum and maximum range of response values.
The location in the dataset where this particular set of responses can be found.
The type of variable (e.g., numeric) for the responses.

relationships.description: Indicates the unweighted count of survey responses from the state.
Indicates the percentage of total survey responses that come from the state.
Indicates that the unweighted frequency contributes to the total number of responses.
Indicates that the percentage contributes to the total number of responses.
Defines the range of responses (minimum to maximum) recorded in the survey.
Indicates where in the dataset the responses can be found.
Indicates the type of variable used for the response values.
